column4: can someone help me configure rythmbox radio. keeps telling me im missing a decoder but i dont know which codecs to install?
in synaptic install all gstreamer plugins
can you give me the command line for terminal?
so search for gstreamer in synaptic and install ALL results?
srry back, what did you say?
yeah basicaly just install all gstreamer plugins
is there a quicker way than just going through and marking each one individually?
no idea, its just 5 or 6 is it realy that hard?

there's quite a lot more than that. am i installing specifically the ones that have the words gstreamer and plugin in the title, or ALL the search results for gstreamer? i'm sorry if that's stupid Q but you're going to have to be specific, i'm new to this
you just start synaptic and and start typing gstreamer it should jump tp the first package with that in its name
oh i see you mean the add/remove i was in package manager, ok but i've checked there and i've installed all the gstreamer plugins that come up
if they are all installed it should work, or there is just not gstreamer plugin for that type of audio data, in which case you should try using something else which doesnt depend on gstreamer
do you mean use another program? is there no way of making rhythmbox radio work? could it be that i have not given the correct URL?
no, what else can i use?
maybe you could suggest a URL that's known to work"?
i do not listen to webradio
